text: @jkenney @ABDanielleSmith “Herd immunity is disease-specific and is influenced by the ease with which the disease spreads from person to person, or the level of contagiousness. The specifics about coronavirus and herd immunity are not yet characterized” cut&paste Am. Heart Assoc.
